source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: Building Android Widgets from Scratch ( Learn 8 Widgets)
items.headline: Build 8 fully functional widgets for Android devices - Right from Scratch in just 2 hours
objectives_summary: You will learn to build fully functional widgets on Android - all on your own, right from scratch

items.title: The Android developer's journey

visible_instructors.name: Codestars

visible_instructors.title: Codestars by Rob Percival

items.headline: Android App Development via Android Studio, the Java object-oriented programming language, together with Google Firebase
objectives_summary: Learn aspects of Android App development, Java programming and Android Studio in fascinating detail.
How to conceive, design, create, develop and publish real-world Android Apps using Java.
How to code and how to code well - take pride in your work and minimise any unnecessary mistakes.

items.title: Mastering Kotlin Coroutines for Android Development
items.headline: Learn how to implement 12+ of the most common use cases for Kotlin Coroutines on Android
objectives_summary: How to implement 12+ of the most common use cases for Kotlin Coroutines on Android.
Get a deep understanding of Kotlin Coroutines (Suspend Functions, Coroutine Builders, blocking vs suspending, Coroutines vs Threads).
Learn advanced Concepts (Structured Concurrency, Coroutine Scopes and Contexts, internal workings)

items.title: Mobile App Development: Make iOS & Android Apps Without Code
items.headline: Quickly produce quality iOS and Android apps without learning any code.
objectives_summary: Create both an iOS and Android app in just a few hours
Monetize your apps with ads, in-app purchases, or app store sales
Quickly bring your app ideas to life

items.title: Swift and iOS8 Apps in 31 Days: Build 16 iPhone apps
items.headline: Design UI and write code using Swift and Xcode 6. Make apps for iOS8 and iPhone 6 – sell your apps on the App Store!
objectives_summary: You will learn how to publish apps to the App Store
How to sell and earn money from your apps
Design and create new iPhone apps from scratch

items.headline: Learn java, android, android studio, android development and android app development with Android 11, become a developer
objectives_summary: Due to its open-source nature, working with the Android platform necessitates constantly learning about the Android platform. My android development course on Udemy keeps you ahead of this learning curve, with hands-on lectures on Android operating systems and more.
Android is the most used operating system on the planet
Learn Android App Development step by step

items.title: Android 50: Crash Course into Android Development

Transferring a screen design into an Android app

items.title: Code a Swift iOS To Do List App, UIKit, CoreData, Table View
items.headline: Learn Widely Used Concepts and Best Practices Used in Modern Day iOS Development to Hone Your Craft and Skill as a Dev
objectives_summary: you will learn the CoreData framework in Swift 4 and Xcode 9
you will learn the updated UIKit Framework in Swift 4 and Xcode 9
You will learn how to build apps without using storyboards! (Which is a very good skill)

items.title: React Native bootcamp - Build an Instagram Clone w/Firebase
items.headline: Understand React Native with Redux, Firebase, Firestore, Firebase Storage, and React Navigation and hybrid Social Media
objectives_summary: Create real-world native apps using React Native
Understand the terminology and concepts of Redux
Make truly reusable components that look great

items.title: QuickChat 2.0 (WhatsApp like chat) iOS10 and Swift 3
items.headline: Whatsapp, quick chat, ios chat, swift, real time chat, ios push notifications, ios call, sinch, firebase database

App to app calling like whatsapp
End to end Encryption
